verbs.description: snoozle (third-person singular simple present snoozles, present participle snoozling, simple past and past participle snoozled)

entries.meaning: (Britain, rare) To nuzzle affectionately. [from earlier 19th c.]
examples: She  […]  seemed absorbed in her occupation; desisting from it only to  […]  push away a dog, now and then, that snoozled its nose overforwardly into her face.
